title: Wonder Cat Kyuu-chan
description:
An adorable full-color manga series about a young man who rescues a very special cat.
Thereâ€™s more to this kitty than meets the eye! Kyuu-chan loves snacks, cuddles, and bow ties, but above all, this mischievous wondercat loves Hinata, the young professional who adopted Kyuu-chan into his home. As the two adjust to life together, they discover that they have a lot to learn from each other. The ordinary and the extraordinary live side by side in this delightful slice-of-life comic for animal lovers and beyond!
author: Nitori, Sasami
